name: Zombies in my House
description:
Zombies in my House - Surive if you can - 

a 2d Survival Horror Game for the 20 Second Game Jam

The zombies can only see what's in the dark. Because of that they manipulated the fuse box of your house so that the electricity is going crazy. Identify the light spots and go there to stay alive. Survive until you will be rescued. Help is on the way!

Learn more about HiSv Studio and our main project "Sherlock - Escape Room Adventure"
